Privacy Policy

Last updated: January 17, 2025

1. Information We Collect

Personal Information

  • Email address (for service delivery and support)
  • Payment information (processed securely by Stripe)
  • Contact details provided during purchase

Technical Information

  • Codebase access for security audits (with client authorization)
  • Basic website analytics (page views, referrers)

2. How We Use Information

  • Deliver purchased services (security audits, gatekeeper kits)
  • Provide customer support
  • Send service-related communications
  • Improve our services

3. Information Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or share personal information with third parties except:

  • Payment processing via Stripe
  • Legal compliance when required
  • Service providers bound by confidentiality agreements

4. Data Security

  • Client code access is temporary and deleted after audit completion
  • All communications encrypted in transit
  • Security audit findings shared only with authorized client contacts

5. Data Retention

  • Contact information: Retained until deletion requested
  • Audit reports: Client retains copies; our copies deleted after 30 days
  • Code access: Terminated immediately after audit completion

6. Your Rights

  • Access your personal information
  • Request corrections or deletions
  • Opt out of non-essential communications

7. Contact

Privacy questions? Email privacy@mmtuentertainment.com
